/*PLEASE DO NOT EDIT THIS CODE*/
/*This code was generated using the UMPLE @UMPLE_VERSION@ modeling language!*/


import java.util.*;

public class Mentor
{

  //------------------------
  // MEMBER VARIABLES
  //------------------------

  //Mentor Attributes
  private String name;
  private String studentsPriority;

  //Mentor Associations
  private List<Student> students;

  //------------------------
  // CONSTRUCTOR
  //------------------------

  public Mentor(String aName)
  {
    name = aName;
    studentsPriority = "id";
    students = new ArrayList<Student>();
  }

  //------------------------
  // INTERFACE
  //------------------------

  public boolean setName(String aName)
  {
    boolean wasSet = false;
    name = aName;
    wasSet = true;
    return wasSet;
  }

  public boolean setStudentsPriority(String aStudentsPriority)
  {
    boolean wasSet = false;
    studentsPriority = aStudentsPriority;
    wasSet = true;
    return wasSet;
  }

  public String getName()
  {
    return name;
  }

  public String getStudentsPriority()
  {
    return studentsPriority;
  }

  public Student getStudent(int index)
  {
    Student aStudent = students.get(index);
    return aStudent;
  }

  public List<Student> getStudents()
  {
    List<Student> newStudents = Collections.unmodifiableList(students);
    return newStudents;
  }

  public int numberOfStudents()
  {
    int number = students.size();
    return number;
  }

  public boolean hasStudents()
  {
    boolean has = students.size() > 0;
    return has;
  }

  public int indexOfStudent(Student aStudent)
  {
    int index = students.indexOf(aStudent);
    return index;
  }

  public static int minimumNumberOfStudents()
  {
    return 0;
  }

  public boolean addStudent(Student aStudent)
  {
    boolean wasAdded = false;
    if (students.contains(aStudent)) { return false; }
    students.add(aStudent);
    if (aStudent.indexOfMentor(this) != -1)
    {
      wasAdded = true;
    }
    else
    {
      wasAdded = aStudent.addMentor(this);
      if (!wasAdded)
      {
        students.remove(aStudent);
      }
    }
    sort(students, studentsPriority);
    
    return wasAdded;
  }

  public boolean removeStudent(Student aStudent)
  {
    boolean wasRemoved = false;
    if (!students.contains(aStudent))
    {
      sort(students, studentsPriority);
      
      return wasRemoved;
    }

    int oldIndex = students.indexOf(aStudent);
    students.remove(oldIndex);
    if (aStudent.indexOfMentor(this) == -1)
    {
      wasRemoved = true;
    }
    else
    {
      wasRemoved = aStudent.removeMentor(this);
      if (!wasRemoved)
      {
        students.add(oldIndex,aStudent);
      }
    }
    sort(students, studentsPriority);
    
    return wasRemoved;
  }

  @SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked", "rawtypes" })
  public void sort(List toSort, final String thePriority)
  {
    if(toSort.size() > 0)
    {
      Collections.sort(toSort, new Comparator<Object>()
      {
        @Override
        public int compare(Object arg0, Object arg1)
        {
          try
          {
            String methodName = "get" + thePriority.substring(0, 1).toUpperCase() + thePriority.substring(1);
            return ((Comparable)arg0.getClass().getMethod(methodName).invoke(arg0)).compareTo((Comparable)arg1.getClass().getMethod(methodName).invoke(arg1));
          }
          catch (Exception e)
          {
            e.printStackTrace();
          }
          return 0;
        }
      });
    }
  }

  public void delete()
  {
    ArrayList<Student> copyOfStudents = new ArrayList<Student>(students);
    students.clear();
    for(Student aStudent : copyOfStudents)
    {
      aStudent.removeMentor(this);
    }
  }

}
